scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:node-esm && npm run build:resolver
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build:node-esm: rimraf dist/node-esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-esm babel src --out-dir dist/node-esm && npm run prettier:node-esm && renamer --find '/\.js$/' --replace '.mjs' 'dist/node-esm/**'
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.build:resolver: rimraf resolver/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-cjs babel resolver/src --out-dir resolver/dist && npm run prettier:resolver
scripts.watch: rimraf dist/es && rimraf dist/node-esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-esm babel ./src -w --out-dir dist/node-esm & cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel ./src -w --out-dir dist/es
scripts.watch:resolver: rimraf resolver/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-cjs babel ./resolver/src -w --out-dir resolver/dist
